UniprotID	A6NHT5
Accession	A6NHT5;A8MU06
EntryName	HMX3_HUMAN
ProteinName	Homeobox protein HMX3 (Homeobox protein H6 family member 3) (Homeobox protein Nkx-5.1)
GeneName	HMX3 NKX-5.1 NKX5-1
Length	357
Function	Transcription factor involved in specification of neuronal cell types and which is required for inner ear and hypothalamus development. Binds to the 5'-CAAGTG-3' core sequence. Controls semicircular canal formation in the inner ear. Also required for hypothalamic/pituitary axis of the CNS (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
